description: Spring Garden was stolen from a museum during the coronavirus lockdown in the Netherlands in March.
title: Stolen Van Gogh: Art detective receives photos of 'stolen work Spring Garden'
title_page: Stolen Van Gogh: Art detective receives photos of 'stolen work Spring Garden' - BBC News
maintext: While he did not explain how he had received the images, he said that they represented "the first 'proof of life' we have that the painting still exists", adding that thieves often destroy valuable pieces of art because of the difficulties involved in reselling them.
